entry.title: About this site
entry.content:
What you learn; is a useful information, knowledge or skill.

During the course of my day to day activities, I encounter some stuff, which is a new learning. This site details all these stuff.

A couple of reasons for doing that:

a.) That I have a list and could gauge my progress b.) I could reference the list and revise my knowledge on the subject c.) I could reference the list and then update my knowledge on those subjects.

Please be rest assured that this would cover a wide range of topics and subjects and may vary from season to season, depending upon what I am doing.

A couple of months back, it could have been a lot about fishing, when I was apprenticing.

I wish I could give you a list of topics, but you could find out from the tags itself.

Please feel free to comment and reach out to me, if you have any query or comments.

Â
